string-array.name: app_description_translate
string-array.item: A na-asụ Igbo na ndịda Naijiria, Kogi, Benue, Equatorial Guinea, Cameroon, Haiti, Barbados, Belize, Trinidad na Tobago, o nyekwaara ndị Jamaican Patois nnukwu okwu.
Igbo is spoken in southern Nigeria, Kogi, Benue, Equatorial Guinea, Cameroon, Haiti,Barbados, Belize, Trinidad and Tobago, it also supplied a large chunk of words to the Jamaican Patois.
